relevant_findings.general: No abnormalities except a few crackles in both lungs.
relevant_findings.neurologic_examination: Orientation intact, long-term memory better than short-term, light perception only in right eye, sluggish pupillary reaction, inability to adduct right eye (abduction preserved), intact corneal reflexes, left eye normal.

physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Right-sided visual loss and oculomotor-nerve palsy noted; visual acuity in right eye deteriorated during hospital stay.

relevant_findings.ophthalmologic: Limited visual acuity in right eye, ptosis of right upper eyelid, evidence of oculomotor nerve palsy present.

physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Continued deterioration of vision in right eye.
